mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category ( id, type, name, sort, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user ) VALUES ( #{id},#{type},#{name},#{sort},#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{createUser},#{updateUser} )
mapper.select: select id, type, name, sort, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user from category order by sort asc limit #{startNum},#{pageSize}
select name from category where id=#{categoryId}
